text: Hello, may I ask you a question?
Hi there, yep fire away
Do you like children?
I do like children. I have 3 of my own
That's a blessing. may I ask you another question?
please ask away
How would you feel if your children were sick and you had no way to help them because of lack of money?
I would feel horrible. I would do all that I could to try and fix that situation

That is a noble sentiment. You are truly blessed to have healthy children. But unfortunately not everyone is so blessed and their are countless children suffering from the very things that make you feel horrible. But what if I told you that you can do something to fix that, how would you respond?
I am aware of others suffering in the world. I would be interested in what can be done to fix the situation.
That is good to hear, and I indeed have great news for you, for today you can help. Have you ever heard of Save the Children NGO?
I have not heard of Save the Children NGO. What do they do?

The long short of it is they provide a way for the severely underprivileged and unrepresented children in this world with a fighting chance to make it to adult hood, something we take for granted sometimes.  For detailed information you can visit their website at  URL   But while I have your attention can I ask you for your help now.  If you donate anywhere up to two dollars you will have made and immeasurable improvement on these young souls.
I can help. I'd be willing to donate $1 to save the children
That is fantastic news. So  I can confirm your agreement of a donation of one dollar to Save the Children?
yes. you can confirm
You are the reason I do this. Many sincere thanks. Would you like instructions now for donating?
sure please send them
The research team will collect all donations and send it to Save the Children. So keep an eye out for the team. A million thanks from a million little ones.
wonderful. I am glad i could help.
